scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,auth,activity,verify,resume,int,notify,file,web "npm run dev -w services/api-gateway" "npm run dev -w services/auth-service" "npm run dev -w services/activity-service" "npm run dev -w services/verification-service" "npm run dev -w services/resume-service" "npm run dev -w services/integration-service" "npm run dev -w services/notification-service" "npm run dev -w services/file-service" "npm run dev -w services/web-app"
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && npm run db:push && npm run seed
scripts.db:push: npm run db:push -w services/auth-service && npm run db:push -w services/activity-service && npm run db:push -w services/verification-service && npm run db:push -w services/resume-service && npm run db:push -w services/integration-service && npm run db:push -w services/notification-service && npm run db:push -w services/file-service
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run prisma:generate -w services/auth-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/activity-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/verification-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/resume-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/integration-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/notification-service && npm run prisma:generate -w services/file-service
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate -w services/auth-service && npm run migrate -w services/activity-service && npm run migrate -w services/verification-service && npm run migrate -w services/resume-service && npm run migrate -w services/integration-service && npm run migrate -w services/notification-service && npm run migrate -w services/file-service
scripts.seed: npm run seed -w services/auth-service && npm run seed -w services/activity-service && npm run seed -w services/verification-service && npm run seed -w services/resume-service && npm run seed -w services/integration-service && npm run seed -w services/notification-service && npm run seed -w services/file-service
